reviews.text:
I stayed at 25hrs for 5 nights for business in October 2024. It's my second stay and I have to say this time the whole experience was better. The rooms still don't have adequate lighting,
but my room this time was a world better than the first time I stayed.  The staff at breakfast made me feel thoroughly looked after and they made adjustments during the week to cater for my Coeliac disease.

I'll look forward to staying again.
Wonderful hotel! breakfast was delicious. I will come back for sure! Nice service and rooms are beautiful. Location 10/10

Absolutley loved the place, can recommend it without hesitation! The staff is lovely and very caring, the location is perfect, breakfast was one of the highlight of my stay and don't get me started on the rooms! so much detail and care in every little corner. Seriously, do yourself the favour and stay at this amazing place, you will not regret it! I'll definetly return and tell everyone who plans a trip to Frankfurt about this hotel!

We arrived late and left relatively early while on a stopover between flight and train, but we were impressed with the hotel and would like to return for a longer stay. The staff were friendly and the room comfy

Left my keys behind,  wrote multiple emails, no reply from staff. You pay a lot of money for the rooms but they won't even bother refill the water bottles each day. Oh and what's with the vampire-style lighting where i can see a thing in my room? I get the bar atmosphere... but you should have a dimmer or something in rooms to allow for full lights on. Wi-Fi not great either. Not impressed.
